description: NeverWage is a token launching on the Binance Smart Chain with a bold mission – to liberate its holders from the soul-crushing monotony of wage labor through passive income and MEMES. With a dedicated web meme platform archiving the community’s meme creativity and dedicated NEET NFTs, we are truly the only anti-work crypto with a meme focus. Built on a strong community, NeverWage aims to empower the disgruntled individual through an ever-growing collection of satirical and hilarious memes that mock and ridicule the emptiness and shallowness of corporate life and hierarchical workplaces. Whether you are a NEET, self-employed, or a wage-slave planning your escape, NeverWage token and its community welcome you with open arms and will serve as a platform for personal empowerment and a source of passive income to progress your goal of independence and personal fulfillment.
